See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SL * Contributions are Copyright (C) 1999-2005 Openbravo, S.L ************************************************************************* * $Id: S_ResourceUnavailable_Trg.sql,v 1.2 2002/10/23 03:16:57 jjanke Exp $ *** * Title: Resource Unavailability * Description: * - Truncate + Fill date * - Endure that start < end ************************************************************************/ BEGIN -- Truncate + Fill Date :new.DateFrom:=TRUNC(:new.DateFrom) ; IF(:new.DateTo IS NULL) THEN :new.DateTo:=:new.DateFrom; ELSE :new.DateTo:=TRUNC(:new.DateTo) ; END IF; -- start < end IF(:new.DateFrom > :new.DateTo) THEN RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR(-20403, 'End Date greater than Start Date') ; END IF; END S_ResourceUnavailable_Trg
